versiondescription: Strategic nuclear bomber version. Reverse engineered from interned B-29s.
loadnotes: Station 1 is the internal bomb bay. It can carry an RDS-3 nuclear bomb (load 8000 and 8.0 load points).
Exceptionally, internal fuel also contributes 1 load point per 50 fuel points. A return mission will typically require leaving the target with at least 750 fuel points (15 load points).
